About

Some years ago I had a bluehost website up, but the expense and time made me abandon it, as a thought experiment I threw this up on GIT using eleventy and converted some of the old content vibe coding with Windsurf. Times sure have changed!

I am technologist and creator in digital and traditional mediums. This site is a laboratory for my experiments
